title: Google\Cloud\Core\Logger\AppEngineFlexHandlerV2
name: AppEngineFlexHandlerV2
description:
Monolog 2.x handler for logging on App Engine flexible environment.

If you are using Monolog 1.x, use Google\Cloud\Core\Logger\AppEngineFlexHandler instead.

Extends \Monolog\Handler\StreamHandler

params.name: level
params.description: The minimum logging level at which this handler will be triggered.

params.name: bubble
params.description: Whether the messages that are handled can bubble up the stack or not.

params.name: filePermission
params.description: Optional file permissions (default (0640) are only for owner read/write).

params.name: useLocking
params.description: Try to lock log file before doing any writes.
